title: Japanese: language and people. - Episodes 6-10.
brief_description: A series of language videos providing an introduction to Japanese language and culture. It is arranged in units and can be accompanied by audiocassettes and teacher/student manuals which may be borrowed as seperate loan items. The topics are: negotiating Japan as a tourist, talking about oneself and life, leisure and sport, giving/receiving gifts, etiquette involved with leave-taking, food and conversation and a review of the series. Japanese landmarks are highlighted as well as daily life in Japan with its many interesting customs.
